concept.title: Case 11: Gifting usage to a friend

section.title: Overview
section.p: Bob has an iPhone associated with a data bucket balance for consumption of data services. Bob has a friend, Fred who has a Blackberry associated with a 1 GB data bucket.
Bob transfers an amount of usage from the iPhone to the Blackberry for consumption of data services.

ul.li: Bob has an iPhone with 50 GB data bucket for consumption of data services.
Bob has a friend, Fred who has a Blackberry with 1 GB data bucket.
Bob transfers 2 GB data from the iPhone data bucket to the Blackberry data bucket using the Service Manager Representational State Transfer Application Programming Interface (SM REST API).
Verify that the current balance of the iPhone data bucket is 48 GB and the Blackberry data bucket is 3 GB.

section.title: Provisioning

note.p: Ensure that after creating a record, you distribute it to ME. Otherwise, the provisioning will not be successful.

section.p:
Following entities are required for this use case. Entities for case 11
Entity Task
Charging Service
Create the following two charging services:
For iPhone: Create a charging service with 50 GB data bucket.
For Blackberry: Create a charging service with 1 GB data bucket.
Lifecycles Create a subscription, account, and device lifecycles.
Bundle Create 50 GB bundle for iPhone and 1 GB bundle for Blackberry and associate them with subscription lifecycle.
Account Create two accounts (each for Bob and Fred) and associate them with account lifecycle.
Device Create two devices - iPhone and Blackberry. Associate iPhone with 50 GB bundle and device lifecycle. Associate Blackberry with 1 GB bundle and device lifecycle.

ol.li: Provision the iPhone and Blackberry in Active state. To do this, log into the SM GUI and navigate to Subscriber Manager and select the Devices tab. Click to create the device.

Create the following two charging services. Navigate to Policy & Charging Configuration and select the Charging tab. Browse to select the Charging Services from the drop-down list. Click to create a charging service.
For iPhone:

Name CS_50GB
Priority 27
Bucket Large_Sharing_Data_Bucket

For Blackberry:

Bucket Sharing_Data_Bucket
Initial value 1

Tariff formula
